modules.name: Signature Series Splort
modules.description: 16 channels polyphonic split with optional linkable sort mode

modules.name: Signature Series Smerge
modules.description: 16 channels polyphonic merge with optional linkable sort mode

modules.name: Signature Series Spleet
modules.description: Dual 4 channels / single 8 channels polyphonic split with optional sort mode

modules.name: Signature Series Swerge
modules.description: Dual 4 channels / single 8 channels polyphonic merge with optional sort mode

modules.name: Signature Series Splirge

modules.name: Quatherina's Quality Quad Quantizer
modules.description:
Quatherina the Quantum Duck's Quantizer with custom & Poly External Scales, 16 scenes, offset, sample and hold,
transposition, lead sheet chords parsing, 4 polyphonic quantizer columns, and a licensed illustration of Quatherina

modules.name: Quatherina's Quack
modules.description: Quatherina the Quantum Duck's smaller quantizer

modules.name: Quatherina's Q<
modules.description: Quatherina the Quantum Duck's tiny quantizer - external or expander input only

modules.name: Quatherina's Quale
modules.description: Convert chords to scales and scales to chords, using Poly External Scale representation

modules.name: Signature Series Darius
modules.description: Branching 8-step sequencer taking a random path through its nodes

modules.name: Signature Series Modulellus Salomonis Regis
modules.description: 4-step sequencer conjuring grand knowledge of the arts for those who self-patch pleasing sigils

modules.name: Signature Series Modulus Salomonis Regis
modules.description: 8-step sequencer conjuring stupendous knowledge of the arts for those who self-patch pleasing sigils

modules.name: Signature Series Modulissimus Salomonis Regis
modules.description: 16-step sequencer conjuring transmundane knowledge of the arts for those who self-patch pleasing sigils

modules.description: Today's fortune ★

modules.description: Today's fortune ★

modules.name: Signature Series Aleister
modules.description: Today's fortune ★

modules.name: Signature Series Psychopump
modules.description: Matches 8 channels of incoming triggers to CV presets. Perfect to get more percussive voices out of a single module.

modules.name: Signature Series Pokies
modules.description: 4 tiny buttons for automation or manual performance of CV parameters. Right-click options to change output values, and use in latch mode.

modules.name: Signature Series Grabby
modules.description:
A lil fader for automation or manual performance of CV parameters. Right-click options to offset and invert output.
 Support for Poly External Scales from Quatherina's Quantizer.

modules.name: Signature Series Rotatoes
modules.description:
4 tiny knobs for automation or manual performance of CV parameters. Right-click options to offset and invert output.
 Support for Poly External Scales from Quatherina's Quantizer.

modules.name: Signature Series Undular
modules.description:
Scroll the rack via CV for live performance. After initialization, waits 10 seconds before processing signals.
If locked out by mistake, save your patch and reload it, you will have 10 seconds to unplug UnDuLaR

modules.name: Signature Series 8hp Blank Plate
modules.description: A complimentary blank plate and ♥-head screwdriver are included with every Signature Series module purchase
